about_the_game:
This set contains the playable unit Gundam Aerial and a pack of items.

Includes:
- Playable unit Gundam Aerial
- Pilot Suletta Mercury
- Expansion Parts
・The emblem of the Holder (Infighters, All-Rounders, and Sharpshooters)
Effect: Aerial Damage+8％ / Sidestep Invulnerability Time 0.02S / [Main Ranged ・ Subweapons] Reload+5％
・Miorine's Tomato
Effect [Infighter]: Melee+150 / [beam type] Melee Attack+20％ / [All Attacks] Stagger Effect+20％

Effect [All-Rounder]: Melee+100 / Ranged+100 / [All Attacks] Stagger Effect+20％

Effect [Sharpshooter]: Ranged+150 / [beam type] Ranged Attack+20％ / [All Attacks] Stagger Effect+20％

・GUND-ARM Inc. Clip (for Infighters, All-Rounders, and Sharpshooters)
Effect: Dropped Capital+2500 / Full MS Repair Kit+15％ / Hate+100％
- 100,000 CAPITAL tickets ×3
・Additional Level Uncap Materials
- 1st Level Uncap Materials: (Infighters, All-Rounders, and Sharpshooters)×3
- 2nd Level Uncap Materials: (Infighters, All-Rounders, and Sharpshooters)×4

・Gundam Game Collaboration BGM
- CALM - MOBILE SUIT GUNDAM BATTLE OPERATION 2
- EMERGENCY - MOBILE SUIT GUNDAM BATTLE OPERATION 2
- Battle IV - MOBILE SUIT GUNDAM U.C. ENGAGE
- A New Encounter I - MOBILE SUIT GUNDAM U.C. ENGAGE
detailed_description:
This set contains the playable unit Gundam Aerial and a pack of items.

Includes:

- Pilot Suletta Mercury

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6300 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 or Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10600K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2080, 8 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
